description: Rehabilitation to provide 47 dwellings  (comprising thirty one-bedroom  eleven two bedroom  five three bedroom  and one four bedroom)  provision of new lift enclosure and refuse store.  APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS: L3.WD.35 36 37 38 39 40 54 55 &80
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 41(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971.
